Nemesis Enforcer/Dark One/Hiss/Breakdown/Scavenger/Pyro:

::Nemesis raisies his rifle, the barrle pointing at Dark One::
"Answer quickly."

::Dark One raises his plasma rifle, aiming at Zardus' head::
"Zardus...don't know you.  What planet is this?  What is the Alliance?  You 
will talk."

::Scavenger raises his own weapon, a chain gun with armor piercing rounds, at 
Nemesis Enforcer::

::Hiss raisies his fusion cannon to point at Nemesis Enforcer::

::Breakdown aims his sonic blaster at Nemesis::

::Pyro aims the flame cannon he has at Zardus::

::Nemesis whispers so only Zardus can hear:: "I think we need some fast 
talking and diplomatic garbage."
